item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 256GB gets massive price drop on Flipkart, Amazon during Republic Day sale - India TV News
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 256GB gets massive price drop on Flipkart, Amazon during Republic Day sale

Publication Date: January 2025   Source: India TV News

The Republic Day Sale events on major e-commerce platforms like Flipkart and Amazon have led to significant discounts on the Samsung Galaxy S24, making it a great time for smartphone buyers.

  • The Samsung Galaxy S24 5G was launched at approximately Rs 80,000 but is now available for much less.
  • On Amazon, the device is listed at Rs 79,999 with a 30% discount, available for Rs 50,999 during the sale.
  • Amazon also offers cashback and trade-in options to customers.
  • Flipkart lists the same device at Rs 79,999, offering a 28% discount, bringing the price down to Rs 57,298.
  • Flipkart offers additional cashbacks for certain payment methods.
“Now is a prime opportunity to make a purchase.”

This sale offers a considerable price reduction on a premium device, coinciding with the upcoming launch of the Samsung Galaxy S25 series, making it an attractive option for potential buyers.

item.title: Homegrown AI startup strengthens partnership with US tech giant Microsoft! What it aims to do - ET Now
item.description:
Homegrown AI startup strengthens partnership with US tech giant Microsoft! What it aims to do

Updated Jan 15, 2025 | Source: ET Now News

A homegrown AI startup has further boosted its partnership with US tech major Microsoft to empower businesses with advanced customer engagement capabilities. Bengaluru-based Exotel, a leading provider of AI transformation for customer engagement and experience, is reshaping the communication landscape for enterprises with Microsoft.

  • Exotel aims to enhance businesses’ customer engagement capabilities aligned with their vision of scalable, cost-efficient communication solutions.
  • Exotel leverages Microsoft Azure Marketplace for AI-powered communication solutions like Intelligent Virtual Assistants and Enterprise Contact Center.
  • The partnership integrates data silos, unifying information sources for better customer conversational profiles across channels.
“Exotel's expertise in AI-powered customer engagement and experience solutions enables businesses to enhance their customer interactions while minimising operational complexities,” said a Microsoft spokesperson.

By strengthening their longstanding partnership, Exotel aims to deliver innovative solutions to enhance customer engagement and streamline communication for businesses.

item.title: Biggest Patch Tuesday in years sees Microsoft address 159 vulnerabilities - ComputerWeekly.com
item.description:
Biggest Patch Tuesday in years sees Microsoft address 159 vulnerabilities

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: Computer Weekly

Microsoft commenced 2025 by addressing a staggering 159 vulnerabilities, marking one of the largest Patch Tuesdays in years, including eight zero-day vulnerabilities.

  • 159 vulnerabilities fixed, including two additional from external sources.
  • The volume of vulnerabilities is three times higher than this time last year.
  • Eight zero-day vulnerabilities were particularly noteworthy, with three already being exploited.
  • Experts emphasize the need for admins to reassess their patching strategies amid these updates.
  • Timely patching is crucial as some vulnerabilities are under active attack.
“This is definitely one of those months where admins need to step back, take a deep breath and determine their plan of attack.” — Tyler Reguly

The large number of vulnerabilities reflects potential challenges ahead for IT professionals in managing security risks effectively.

item.title: DJI Flip drone, a lightweight vlog camera, launched in India: Price, features and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
DJI Flip drone, a lightweight vlog camera, launched in India: Price, features and more

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Live Mint

The DJI Flip is a new lightweight and versatile vlog camera drone that combines the best features of the DJI Neo and DJI Mini for powerful aerial photography.

Key Features:

  • Foldable propeller guards made from lightweight carbon fiber for enhanced durability.
  • Automatic braking system and 3D Infrared Sensing for secure flying in low-light conditions.
  • 1/1.3-inch CMOS sensor for capturing 48MP stills and 4K HDR videos at 60fps.
  • Supports slow-motion recording at 100fps and offers a 4:3 aspect ratio sensor for vertical shots.
  • Six intelligent shooting modes including Dronie, Circle, Rocket, Spotlight, Helix, and Boomerang.
  • Available in multiple configurations with prices starting at ₹37,927.

Availability and Pricing:
The DJI Flip is available in India, priced at ₹37,927 for the base model, ₹55,203 for the model with the DJI RC 2 controller, and ₹67,299 for the Fly More Combo. Shipping has already commenced through DJI’s official channels.

item.title: Huawei launches Band 9 and FreeBuds SE2; price starts at Rs 2,999 - The Times of India
item.description:
Huawei launches Band 9 and FreeBuds SE2; price starts at Rs 2,999

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

Huawei has unveiled two new products: the Band 9 and FreeBuds SE2, aimed at affordable segment users with a starting price of Rs 2,999.

  • The Huawei Band 9 features health monitoring capabilities.
  • FreeBuds SE2 offers improved sound quality and battery life.
  • Both products come with competitive pricing, targeting budget-conscious consumers.
“We aim to cater our products to users looking for high-quality technology at an affordable price,” said a Huawei spokesperson.

This launch underscores Huawei's continued commitment to delivering advanced technology in the wearables and audio market.

item.title: Apps Set To Give Way To Assistants: How ChatGPT, Google Gemini, Meta AI May Reshape Our Digital Lives - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Apps Set To Give Way To Assistants: How ChatGPT, Google Gemini, Meta AI May Reshape Our Digital Lives

Date: 15 Jan 2025 Source: NDTV Profit Tech

The article discusses the anticipated shift from mobile apps to AI assistants like ChatGPT, Google Gemini, and Meta AI. This change is predicted to reshape how users engage with technology.

  • By 2027, mobile app usage may fall by 25% due to reliance on AI assistants.
  • Brands with low app engagement will be most affected.
  • Over one-third of web content will cater to generative AI-powered searches by 2026.
  • Marketing strategies will adapt with a shift toward subscription-based platforms.
“By 2026, over one-third of web content will be created for the purposes of gen AI-powered search.”

This trend highlights a fundamental transformation in digital interactions, pushing brands to reevaluate their marketing and engagement strategies in light of AI advancements.

item.title: Daily News Wrap: Samsung's AI Vision for Galaxy S25 Series, Realme GT 7 Pro Discount, and More - MySmartPrice
item.description:
Daily News Wrap: Samsung's AI Vision for Galaxy S25 Series, Realme GT 7 Pro Discount, and More

Publication Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: MySmartPrice

Samsung has unveiled its AI plans for the upcoming Galaxy S25 series, along with news of discounts for the Realme GT 7 Pro and new product launches from Huawei.

  • Samsung is integrating advanced AI features in its Galaxy smartphones, aiming to enhance productivity and creativity.
  • The Galaxy S series will showcase new multimodal mobile AI capabilities during the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22.
  • Realme is offering early buyers of the GT 7 Pro a Rs 3,000 coupon, valid for registration from January 13 to 21.
  • Huawei is launching wearables like the Band 9, priced at Rs 4,499, and FreeBuds SE2 for Rs 2,299.
  • OpenAI has introduced a 'Tasks' feature for ChatGPT to help users set reminders and schedule actions.
  • ASUS partnered with Zepto to deliver its accessories collection across select major cities.
"Galaxy smartphones are poised to become true AI companions." - Samsung

This news reflects the dynamic changes in the tech landscape with AI at the forefront, and consumer-friendly initiatives by brands to enhance user experience.

item.title: Android co-founder on Microsoft’s $400 billion loss — 'Sorry Bill, that’s on you' - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Android Co-Founder Blames Bill Gates for Microsoft's $400 Billion Loss

Publication Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: CNBC TV18

In a recent interview, Bill Gates acknowledged Microsoft's failure to compete in the smartphone market, attributing it to poor management. Android's co-founder, Rich Miner, criticized Gates, claiming that the loss of $400 billion is primarily his fault.

  • Rich Miner reflects on how he helped create Android to provide an alternative to Microsoft's control over mobile.
  • Bill Gates admitted that Microsoft missed vital opportunities during an interview, calling it “the greatest mistake of all time.”
  • The delay in launch and reliance on the PC strategy hampered Microsoft's ability to compete with Apple and Android.
  • Microsoft's acquisition of Nokia failed to revive its mobile strategy, resulting in significant layoffs and an eventual exit from the smartphone market.

“Sorry Bill, you're more responsible for losing the $400B than you realize.”
— Rich Miner (@richminer)

The events serve as a stark reminder of the importance of adapting to technological shifts, a lesson that has cost Microsoft dearly.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Ring Gets Two New Size Options, More Health Features With New Update - News18
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Ring Gets Two New Size Options, More Health Features With New Update

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: News18

The Samsung Galaxy Ring is now available in more sizes and offers enhanced health tracking features with a recent update, making it accessible for a wider audience.

  • The Galaxy Ring now comes in 11 sizes, catering to users with larger hands.
  • Price in India starts at Rs 38,999, with a battery life of one week.
  • The ring tracks sleep, heart rate, and fitness metrics, with built-in storage and an IP68 water resistance rating.
  • New health features include analysis of sleep patterns based on room temperature and air quality.
  • The device can be paired with non-Galaxy Android phones, though features are limited compared to Galaxy devices.
"The Galaxy Ring will analyze your sleep patterns and recommend a routine to suit your habits."

This update enhances the usability and functionality of the Samsung Galaxy Ring, broadening its appeal and offering new health monitoring capabilities.

item.title: “Sorry Bill”: Android co-founder blames Gates for Microsoft’s $400 Billion smartphone failure - The Financial Express
item.description:
Rich Miner Blames Bill Gates for Microsoft's Smartphone Failure

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Financial Express

Rich Miner, co-founder of Android, attributes Microsoft's smartphone market failures to Bill Gates, stating it cost the company approximately $400 billion in market value.

  • Miner claims Gates' monopolistic approach stifled innovation in mobile devices.
  • He insists that Android was created to counter Microsoft's dominance in the mobile sector.
  • Gates acknowledges his mismanagement as a significant mistake for Microsoft.
  • The article discusses Microsoft's missed opportunities to adopt a more open and flexible approach in the mobile market.
“The greatest mistake of all time is the mismanagement I engaged in that caused Microsoft not to be what Android is.” - Bill Gates

This discussion highlights the importance of adaptability and innovation in the tech industry, reflecting on how major companies can miss pivotal shifts in market trends.

item.title: Galaxy A56 could be the first Galaxy AI mid-range phone featuring ‘Awesome Intelligence’ - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Galaxy A56 could be the first Galaxy AI mid-range phone featuring 'Awesome Intelligence'

Publication Date: January 15, 2025

Source: SamMobile

Samsung is exploring the possibility of introducing advanced AI features to its Galaxy A series, specifically through the upcoming Galaxy A56.

  • Samsung has previously included basic AI features in the Galaxy A series.
  • New trademark applications for “Awesome Intelligence” indicate a push towards incorporating AI into the Galaxy A lineup.
  • The Galaxy A56 is expected to feature the Exynos 1580 chip, which may support more advanced AI functionalities.
  • Potential AI features could enhance user experience with capabilities like text summarization and AI notifications.
"It does look that way… the Galaxy A56 sounds like a decent contender."

The introduction of 'Awesome Intelligence' could signify a major shift in Samsung's approach to mid-range smartphones, potentially offering consumers advanced features previously reserved for high-end devices.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus gets 40% discount; Check new price in Flipkart Monumental Sale - Mint
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus gets 40% discount; Check new price in Flipkart Monumental Sale

Publication Date: January 2023 Source: Live Mint

During Flipkart’s Monumental Sale, the Samsung Galaxy S24, originally priced at ₹99,999, is now available for ₹59,999. Additional bank offers can further reduce the price to ₹56,999.

Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus Under ₹60,000: Check Offer Details

The Galaxy S24 Plus is currently listed at ₹59,999. With bank discounts, it can drop to ₹56,999, making it a competitive option in the market.

Is The Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus Worth It? What You Should Know

Samsung remains a leading brand in the premium smartphone sector, but alternatives like OnePlus and iQOO provide stronger competition at more attractive price points.

  • Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus discounted to ₹59,999 during the sale.
  • Potential savings of up to ₹3,000 with compatible credit cards.
  • Competing options include OnePlus 13 and iQOO 13 at similar prices.
  • Upcoming Galaxy S25 series may offer better performance.
"If you’re a power user seeking the latest, there are other compelling options available."

Consider waiting for the Galaxy S25 series if seeking the latest technology.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus gets 40% discount; Check new price in Flipkart Monumental Sale | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus gets 40% discount; Check new price in Flipkart Monumental Sale

Publication Date: January 20, 2023

Source: Live Mint

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus is currently available at a significantly reduced price during Flipkart’s Monumental Sale, just ahead of the launch of the Galaxy S25 series.

The original launch price of the Galaxy S24 was ₹99,999, but it can now be purchased for ₹59,999, with additional discounts available through bank offers.

  • Current Price: ₹59,999, potentially reduced to ₹56,999 with bank offers.
  • Comparison with competitors suggests better value options may be available, such as the OnePlus 13 for around ₹65,000.
  • Upcoming Galaxy S25 series expected to have superior performance with the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
“If you’re a power user seeking the latest and greatest, there are other compelling options.”

In conclusion, while the discounted Galaxy S24 Plus is an attractive offer, consumers may want to consider waiting for the upcoming models or exploring alternatives that offer better value.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series to Introduce Multimodal Capabilities in AI-Powered Sketch to Image Feature - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Expands Sketch to Image Feature with Galaxy S25 Series

Publication Date: Tuesday
Source: Gadgets360

Samsung recently announced enhancements to its Sketch to Image feature, enabling multimodal capabilities for the upcoming Galaxy S25 series, part of its integrated AI platform in One UI 7.

  • The new Sketch to Image will allow users to generate images with a combination of sketches and text prompts.
  • Previously, the tool could only refine existing sketches, but new updates will enable the generation of creative images based on user descriptions.
  • The update supports both S Pen and finger inputs for enhanced accessibility.
“With the new version of the AI tool, users can bring their imagination to reality.”

This significant enhancement allows for greater creativity and expression, broadening the scope of what users can create using the tool.

item.description:
Massive Discounts on iPhone 16 Series for Republic Day Sale

Publication Date: January 13, 2025 Source: The Times of India

The Republic Day 2025 sale season brings exciting discounts on the iPhone 16 series through Flipkart and Amazon, offering significant savings until January 19.

  • iPhone 16 Pro Max's price dropped from Rs 1,44,900 to Rs 1,32,900 on Flipkart with an HDFC Bank offer.
  • iPhone 16 Pro now costs Rs 1,07,900 after discounts on Flipkart, compared to Rs 1,09,513 on Amazon.
  • iPhone 16 Plus available at Rs 75,999 after discounts for HDFC customers on Flipkart.
  • Entry-level iPhone 16 priced at Rs 64,999 on Flipkart with additional bank offers.
“If you're looking for the most affordable entry into the iPhone 16 series, Flipkart delivers the best deal.”

This sale represents a great opportunity for customers to take advantage of substantial discounts on Apple's latest smartphone lineup.

item.title: Samsung teases new Galaxy AI features ahead of Galaxy S series launch - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Samsung Teases New Galaxy AI Features Ahead of Galaxy S Series Launch

Date: 15 January 2025
Source: Deccan Herald

With the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event, Samsung has introduced exciting generative AI features for the Galaxy S series that enhance user interaction with smartphones.

  • Samsung's new AI integration allows natural conversations with the device for tasks like finding restaurants and setting reminders.
  • Enhanced features in the Galaxy S25 series include improvements to the AI-powered Sketch to Image application, enabling users to create detailed images from sketches.
  • The Galaxy S25 series will debut these features, which will be available on older models later this year.
"With One UI 7, Samsung’s first integrated AI platform, Galaxy smartphones will become true AI companions that understand natural language through text, speech, and images."

The upcoming Galaxy S series promises to elevate user creativity and experience through innovative AI functionalities, setting a new standard in mobile technology.

item.title: SpaceX launching Starship Flight 7 on Jan. 16: Watch it live - Space.com
item.description:
SpaceX Launches Starship Flight 7 on January 16: Watch Live

Publication Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: Space.com

SpaceX is set to launch the seventh test flight of its Starship megarocket on Thursday (Jan. 16), that will also be broadcasted live.

  • Starship is a 400-foot-tall (122 meters) rocket scheduled to lift off from SpaceX's Starbase in South Texas at 5 p.m. EST.
  • This will be the first flight in 2025 and aims to enhance the reuse capabilities of the entire rocket system.
  • The flight will feature the deployment of 10 mock Starlink satellites.
  • The previous flights have led to significant milestones including the capture of Super Heavy by the launch tower's arms.
"This new year will be transformational for Starship, with the aim of bringing reuse of the entire system online and flying increasingly ambitious missions as we iterate towards being able to send humans and cargo to Earth orbit, the moon and Mars." - SpaceX

The upcoming test flight marks an important step in SpaceX’s mission to enhance its Starship program.
